# CHANGELOG.md

## 1.1.0 (2023-02-01)

Features:

    - registerGlobal allow to use global variable across worker and main thread 

## 1.0.1 (2022-10-18)

Fix:

    - Cleanup npm package
    - Fix github actions

## 1.0.0 (2022-10-18)

Features:

    - registerWorker and workerize allow to use a class instance within a webworker
